Package tictactoe

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • tictactoe.ImmutableGameBoard
      • tictactoe.GameBoard
  • class GameBoard
extends ImmutableGameBoard
    Represents a 2D game board that can be edited.
    Author:
    Tapio Malmberg

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class tictactoe.ImmutableGameBoard

      Creates a new GameBoard with the given width and height.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ImmutableGameBoard asImmutable()
      Returns this game board as an immutable game board that cannot be edited.

      Fills the whole game board with the given value.

      Sets the contents of the game board square at the given x, y coordinate to value.

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard​(int width,
                 int height)
        Creates a new GameBoard with the given width and height.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the game board, must be greater than zero
        height - the height of the game board, must be greater than zero

    • Method Detail

      • fillBoard

        public void fillBoard​(byte value)
        Fills the whole game board with the given value.
        Parameters:
        value - the value that the game board will be filled with

      • setSquare

        public void setSquare​(Coordinate pos,
                      byte value)
        Sets the contents of the game board square at the given coordinate to value.
        Parameters:
        pos - the coordinate of the square to be changed
        value - the value that the square will be set to

      • setSquare

        public void setSquare​(int x,
                      int y,
                      byte value)
        Sets the contents of the game board square at the given x, y coordinate to value.
        Parameters:
        x - the x value of the game board square
        y - the y value of the game board square
        value - the value that the square will be set to

      • asImmutable

        public ImmutableGameBoard asImmutable()
        Returns this game board as an immutable game board that cannot be edited.
        Returns:
        this game board as an immutable game board
